description: Rectangular array defined by T(i,1)=T(1,j)=1 for i>=0 and j>=0; T(i,j)=Max(T(i-1,j)+T(i-1,j-1); T(i-1,j-1)+T(i,j-1)) for i>=1, j>=1, read by antidiagonals.
comments: Antidiagonal sums: A029907.Main diagonal: A001519 (odd-indexed Fibonacci numbers).Next diagonal: A001906 (even-indexed Fibonacci numbers).
links: A. Dil and I. Mezo, A symmetric algorithm for hyperharmonic and Fibonacci numbers, Appl. Math. Comp. 206 (2008) 942-951. Eq (11), incomplete Fibonacci numbers. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 16 2009]
formula: G.f. x*y*(1-x*y)/((x*y+x-1)*(x*y+y-1)). - Mark van Hoeij, Nov 09 2011
maple: G := x*y*(1-x*y)/((x*y+x-1)*(x*y+y-1)); G := convert(series(G, x=0, 11),polynom):for i from 1 to 10 do series(coeff(G,x,i),y=0,11) od; - Mark van Hoeij, Nov 09 2011
author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 02 2000
extensions: Updated from pre-2003 triangular format to present rectangular, from Clark Kimberling, Jun 20 2011
